name: Life is Strange Fan Made Gameplay
name_original: Life is Strange Fan Made Gameplay
description:
Controls

WASD - Move
Shift - Jog
R - Rewind
Scroll Wheel - Zoom Out/In
Mouse Middle Button - Reset Camera Position
C - Switch Camera Side
ESC - Pause Menu

Known Bugs

  1. The boxes sometimes falls off when starting the level, making it difficult to rewind and stack them on top of each other for the scare sequence.
  2. The outline for classic Chloe outfit (beanie) is sometimes offset from the model, making it look like there are two models. Known workaround - talk to Chloe and the outline should snap back in place after that.
  3. Audio controls don't actually work.

Credits

Voice for Max: KatiesGaming - katiesgaming - Twitch
Voice for Chloe: Sky Rae - Professional Voice-Over Artist | SkyRaeVoicing
